title: Interpretation of figs in a dream - seeing figs in a dream

preview.html: Fig vision for a single man, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she eats the green, spoiled, fresh, dried black ones picked by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of figs in a dream Figs are the money of a dream and a lot of fertility for those affected by it. Figs are a rich man who has a lot of money, a useful man who takes refuge from the enemies of Islam, because snakes protect this tree and there is no equivalent in the fruits. He felt that by eating it, so his offspring multiplied. It was said: Figs were given from Iraq, and an amount of money that fertilizes its owner without fatigue, and its effect appears. And eating some food without effort. It was said: The fruit of the fig and its leaves are severity, grief and sadness, so whoever eats it is disturbed by a matter that has reached him or is coming to him. It was said: Figs are interpreted as: the righteous, the choice of people, sustenance and ease, complete pleasure, and abundant blessings. And black figs in season are good. White figs are better than black figs. If one sees figs at a different time, this indicates envy presented to the dreamer. Perhaps the fig represents the oath. Perhaps the fig indicates an oath, and if the fig is black, the oath is invalid, and it may indicate sadness, sorrow, and moving from a higher place to a lower one. Perhaps it indicates regret, as regret means all figs. Interpretation of figs in a dream. Whoever sees that he is eating figs, this may be a sign of hearing some good news and joy. Getting closer to his wife, but whoever sees that he is offering others a plate of figs, this means that he will get married soon. Interpretation of dried figs in a dream. The person who sees dried figs in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a set of hopes and dreams that the person desires, which will make a difference in his life and help him enjoy a good situation with his children and be able to get rid of them. The problems that stand as an obstacle in the dreamer's life, and this can be evidence of praise for seeing figs Interpretation of figs in a dream OneIn the event that an unmarried girl sees figs in a dream, this can be a clear indication of getting rid of the problems and troubles that a person suffers from in his life. It can be clear evidence of a close marriage with a person who is distinguished from others. And if he sees that he is eating figs, this is a sign of lawful food or money from God Almighty. The virgin girl who sees it in her dream is a sign of God Almighty and clear evidence that she earns legitimate money, and it is commendable to see figs for the virgin and the unmarried. Interpretation of figs in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees figs in a dream and takes a plate of figs and does not eat them, this can be a clear sign that she suffers from some psychological disorders, fatigue and constant atonement for unsolvable worries. In the event that she sees that she is eating figs from her husband, this may be evidence that she gives birth to her husband and will continue to carry him until the end of her life. When a married woman sees that she is eating figs without her husband, this means that she is heralding goodness and joy in her coming life. Interpretation Figs in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman is in a special state, as figs symbolize goodness and the birth of a special male child. Interpretation of a tree

title: Interpretation of a song in a dream - Interpretation of songs in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the song is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or a single young man, whether the singer’s voice is high or low, with dancing or without music. And others from Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the song in a dream. If the song in the dream is with a beautiful voice, this indicates that the dreamer will enter into a profitable business, but if the singer’s voice is not beautiful, then the dreamer’s business will be lost. If the dreamer is rich and dreams that he is singing in the market, this indicates That there are hidden things about him that will be revealed. If the dreamer of the song is poor, this indicates the death of his mind. Whoever sees that he is singing in the bathroom during his sleep, this indicates the words of the accused. Whoever sees that he is singing in a closed place, then the subject indicates a lie or a conspiracy that will divide loved ones and prevail. Envy. It is said that singing in a dream is false talk and bad luck befalls the person. Anyone who sees him walking in the street singing will be disturbed. Whoever hears singing in a dream, God has blessed him with happy friends who will take away his worries and relieve him. Singing is usually positive in a dream if a person sees himself singing by himself alone. And it can bring back negative dimensions to the dreamer if he sees someone singing to him by withdrawing his voice, whether it is bad or beautiful. And whoever sees that he is singing, it is evidence of his death, and he will be called a liar, misguided, sad, and scandalous. The song, if it is in a good voice, indicates a profitable deal, and if it is not... If you have a good voice, it is a losing deal. Among them are those who say that singing in the market for the rich is a revelation, and for the poor a loss of the mind. Singing in the bathroom is an accusatory talk. And whoever dreams that he is singing in a place where there is a lie or plot that divides lovers. Interpretation of song in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad ibn Sirin said in His book (Interpretation of Great Dreams) Seeing singing and singing in a dream has different meanings. If it is good, it indicates a profitable trade, and if it is not good, then it indicates a losing deal. It is said that the singer is a scholar, a wise man, or a man, and the conspirator is an envious liar. Because the first one who sang and was sad, Satan, may God curse him, is an indication of laziness and poverty, and if someone dreams that he is walking in the mud and singing, this is good, especially for the one who sells sticks and the singer in the bathroom speaking. Interpretation of a song in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. The interpretation of the scholar Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi does not differ much from what was narrated by Muhammad bin Sirin about seeing singing and singing in a dream, where Al-Nabulsi said that singing in a dream is evidence of false speech. If the sound of the song is beautiful, this indicates useful and righteous work, and this indicates failure and loss. In a dream, it is false talk and a disaster, and if the sound is beautiful, it indicates a profitable trade, and if the sound is not beautiful, then it is a losing deal. There is evil and strife due to the change of movements in the dance, and whoever sees that he is singing poems with a good melody and a beautiful voice, then this is good for the owners of the song and melodies and the people of music. Whoever dreams that he is singing in the bathroom, this indicates that his words are not clear, and there will be a commotion in that market, and the singing of ignorant people in the market indicates lack of reason. Singing accompanied by dancing in a dream is a sign of evil and harm, and as for a man singing in the bathroom,

title: Interpretation of a dream about a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of camels in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man. Her son gives birth to a beautiful camel, Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Imam Al-Sadiq, and more interpretations in continuation of the topic below. Seeing a camel in a dream has many meanings that vary depending on the place and people. If one sees in a dream that he is buying a small camel, this is evidence that debts will soon be paid to that person who sees, God willing. Interpretation of a camel in a dream A camel in a dream is a woman, a year, a tree, a ship, a palm tree or a knot from the complex of this world. Whoever has it or rides it is married if he is free, or travels if he travels, or has a house, land, crops, or tax, the milking is exploited, collected, and benefited from what it indicates. Unless he sucked it with his mouth, he would be humiliated. For the pilgrims, the screamer, the dome, and the carriage: all of these are women, they cover and ride, and whoever sees an unknown camel flowing with milk in the mosque, in the courtyard, or on the farms, it is a fertile year. . Unless people are under siege, fear, turmoil, or this is heresy; Because it disappears due to the emergence of the natural instinct; Because camel milk is an instinct and a Sunnah, and the Arabian camel attributed to a woman is the honorable Arab. Hasiba. * It was said: It is camel meat and camel milking because the one who drives it is a fair woman, and the hand of a camel is a journey in the wilderness, and milking is a journey on the road. Another narration was narrated by a man who saw her riding a camel and said: M. Obedience to women. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating camel meat and its taste is delicious and tasty, this is evidence that she will hear happy and good news in the coming days, God willing. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is cooking Camel meat and its taste is good, this is evidence of the skin of the future lamb, God willing. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her husband is slaughtering a camel, this is evidence of kindness and livelihood for this woman soon. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is buying a camel This is evidence that she will soon marry a well-off man, and live with him in peace and stability, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for an old woman: If an old woman sees in a dream that she is eating camel meat and it has a distinctive and beautiful taste, this is evidence of her recovery from a disease she was suffering from. A long time ago. Interpretation of a camel in a dream for a man. If one sees in a dream that he is grazing camels in a large land of crops, this is evidence that the dreamer will find a suitable job or a promotion at work. Seeing a camel - gray hair - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 101 in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 101 in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees the number 101 in her dream, then that girl also prays by looking at the number. This indicates that this girl will be happy in the coming days and will be psychologically comfortable. Get rid of all traps, and stop complaining. And she suffers from it. When one girl dreams of the number 101 in her dream, that girl is also sad in reality. It shows that this girl will be able to solve all the problems. The fears she faces will change her life and she will live a much better life. But if an unmarried girl sees the number 101 in In her dream, and she was studying at the university, she sees this number. This interpretation indicates that this girl is intelligent, studies with distinction and will achieve good results in her tests. Also, seeing the only girl in her dream number 101, and seeing her with a face that she loved and was happy. This indicates that this girl She will address this person in the next few days. She will fill her life with joy, comfort, and happiness with this person. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 51 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 101 in a dream for a married woman. A married woman when she sees the number 101 in her dream and is happy in reality. This vision shows that This woman lives a happy and beautiful life based on understanding, love and friendship between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman in her dream with the number 101 and she was thinking and waiting for the news in reality. This dream is interpreted as an indication that this woman will soon be happy to hear good news that will make her happy or the news of her pregnancy. Soon, God willing. If a married woman dreams of the number 101 in her sleep, and she cries in a dream. The interpretation of this dream indicates that this woman will be released soon. And her life will turn into a more stable and beautiful life away from all the problems, worries and sorrows in the coming days. When a married woman dreams With the number 101 in her dream, that woman is also thinking a lot in reality. This dream says that this woman is worried about something and cannot balance. There are people in her life who make her worry and she needs to stay away from these people. Interpretation of seeing the number 101 in a dream about a man and its meaning. If A man saw the number 101 in his dream, then this man is also very happy to see it in a dream. This vision indicates that this person will earn a lot of money. He will open a job for him and establish it, and cultivate it to raise it in the coming period. When a man sees the number 101 in his dream and talks to his wife in Dream: This dream indicates that this man is obedient and loyal to his wife. He likes to participate in business matters and have her opinion, and he likes to go out with her, understand and talk. He also sees the man in his 101st sleep and watches him while he is sad. Seeing this dream interprets that this man will He is going through many problems and difficulties that will affect him. He will go through a difficult period in his life, but soon he will get rid of all these traps. A man dreamed of the number 101 in a dream and this man was waiting for some news in reality. This dream indicates that this man will soon learn about

title: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by an unmarried woman: One of the disturbing dreams that can abound in our dreams is the dream of betrayal, which can specifically make a girl feel anxious and searching. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by an unmarried woman so that she feels safe, comfortable, and free from anxiety. And the interpretation of a dream about betrayal is not all bad. It can indicate some praiseworthy things about its owner, whether the dreamer is a single girl or a married man or woman. The interpretation varies according to the status of the Prophet. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s betrayal of an unmarried woman. According to what scholars say, the interpretation of a dream about betrayal by an unmarried woman has many different meanings, so it can be a good vision that indicates her relationship with others and it can be a sign of what is going on in her life. We will show you on the different website what it means to see betrayal in a dream, according to the following: If a single girl sees her fiancé or the person with whom she has a relationship cheating on her, it is a sign of this person’s love for her and that their relationship will end in marriage soon. But if the opposite happens and she sees in her dream that she is cheating The man she loves, this is a sign that she has committed some sins in her life. In the first case, the girl must abandon these bad actions and return to the path of truth, hoping that God will forgive and accept her. Seeing betrayal in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of her stress In her life and she is seeking marriage. When a girl sees that her friends are cheating on her, this vision could be a sign that her friends do not love her and are planning some big disasters for her. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal by a married woman. Betrayal in a dream of a married woman varies. A little about the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman cheating. This is according to what some interpretation scholars have said, and we will explain it below: When a woman sees that her husband is cheating on her in her dream, this is clear evidence that her husband loves her very much and does not want to leave her and that they will live the best married life together. For a woman to see that her husband Cheating on her could be a sign that he feels far away from her and wants to get closer to her and reciprocate the feeling of love. But if you see the opposite, and that she is cheating on her husband in a dream, then this is an undesirable sign, as this dream indicates poverty and a lot of debt, and her life changes from joy to Sadness. If the wife sees one of her relatives committing treason, this may be a sign of her feeling anxiety and fear of losing her family. When the wife sees treason in a dream while she is pregnant during this period, this is a sign that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. title: I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married

preview.html: I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married through the website Vision roy2a.com. Marriage is God’s law on earth and has many good purposes, the most important of which is reproduction and increasing offspring for the sake of life on earth, so it is one of the important things in all heavenly religions. In most societies around the world, seeing a wedding in a dream has different interpretations according to the details of the vision, and we will show you the most important things that great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen, and others have stated. This is important, so follow us. I dreamed that I got married to someone I know who is married. Seeing an unmarried woman getting married in a dream. Getting married in reality indicates problems and obstacles that she will face in her life in the coming period. Seeing a wedding with a married person in a dream may indicate the presence of a single woman in the near future. Someone will come to her and agree to marry him. Seeing a wedding in a dream for a divorced woman from a married woman means that her problems will end and that there is relief near her that will remove all her distress. I dreamed that I married someone I know and he is married to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a wedding in a dream from an unknown person is an indication of the term It is approaching. Seeing a wedding in a married woman’s dream indicates that the man was dead due to the sadness that was approaching her. Seeing a man indicates that his wife is marrying another person, that there is an imminent loss that he will suffer in his money or dealings, or an indication of a decline in debt. Seeing the husband getting married His wife in a dream with another man indicates a noticeable improvement in his life in the coming period. Seeing marriage to an elderly and unknown person in the dream means that there is a lot of goodness, increased nutrition and happiness that comes to the dreamer. I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married to single people. Seeing an unmarried woman A married woman getting married to a married man in a dream could be a sign of a successful relationship that she will experience in the coming periods, especially if she was happy with this marriage in the dream. As for seeing a wedding with a married man in one dream? She felt sad because it indicated that she would be exposed to problems and crises in her life in the future. Nearby. Seeing an unmarried woman marrying a married man whom she does not know in a dream indicates that a lot of good things and food will come to this in the near future. Seeing a wedding with a married man in an engaged girl’s dream indicates her disagreements with her fiancé during this period. I dreamed that I got married From someone I know who is married to a married woman. Seeing a married woman marrying a married woman. Signing to get rid of the problems and crises she faced in her married life. Seeing a dead man getting married in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the worry and worry that prevailed during this period. I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married to a pregnant woman. Seeing a woman A pregnant woman in a dream marries a married man, an indication of the ease of childbirth. A vision of marriage for a pregnant woman may be an indication of her ability to raise and care for her children in the future. We are happy to show you the reception location of your dreams. “I dreamed that I got married while I was single to someone I do not know through marriage.”

title: Interpretation of seeing my mother scolding and screaming in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation: My mother is arguing and yelling at me in a dream. If a man dreams of his mother scolding him and yelling at him in a dream, then this is a sign of this man’s ingratitude to his mother. The girl is free. Whoever sees her mother screaming and arguing with her in her sleep. This is an indication that this girl is committing acts that her mother does not approve of. Whereas if a married woman sees her mother screaming at her and scolding her in a dream. This is evidence that this woman does not listen to her mother’s advice in real life. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased mother arguing and screaming in a dream. If one of them sees his deceased mother arguing with him and shouting at him in the dream, it is a sign that the dreamer and his brothers They do not behave well in the inheritance left to them by their mother. So seeing a dead mother screaming and hitting her children in a dream is evidence that her children are far from applying God’s laws and committing many sins and disobedience. This vision warns them to stop the sins they are committing and return to the right path and repent to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother sad in a dream. If a man sees his mother sad in a dream, this is a sign that he has disobeyed her. If an unmarried girl sees her mother sad in a dream, this is a sign that this girl is annoying her mother and making her angry with her behavior. A married woman if she sees her mother sad in a dream. This is a sign of severing the relationship between her and her mother in reality. Interpretation of seeing my mother punishing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A dream of scolding one’s mother in a dream is a clear indication of the dreamer’s failure in his parental rights. And that he should review himself and start being fair and kind to them. Likewise, if a man sees his mother in In a dream, scolding him, this is a sign of his shortcomings in his family rights and lack of connection with his relatives. If one sees that his mother is scolding him in a dream, this is an indication of the great role that the dreamer plays in establishing peace between two groups of close acquaintances. Interpretation of a dream about my mother hitting me in a dream. If he sees a free girl being beaten by her mother In a dream, this is a sign of the mother’s guidance and directing her to the right path. She needs to listen to her mother’s advice in real life. If an unmarried girl sees that her mother is beating her in her dream, this is evidence that her mother was upset with her because of simple things such as not helping her in affairs Household. If an unmarried girl sees her mother hitting her with a stick in a dream, this means that this girl is committing wrong actions and that her mother is leading her to the right path. What if a man sees in a dream his mother hitting him, this is a sign that she will leave him a large inheritance after her death. But if a man sees In a dream that his mother hits him with a shoe, this is an unpleasant vision. It appears that the visionary is falling into serious problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing my mother calling my name in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees her mother calling her, this vision by her name in a dream is a warning to this girl about the evil people around her who want to harm her. As for A married woman who sees her mother calling her name in a dream is a sign that she will face some marital problems and disagreements between her and her husband.

title: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: The car in a single woman’s dream: We often dream of driving a car or a car, so we start looking for an interpretation of the car in the dream of the single, married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, and the unmarried young man, and what do the interpreters think about this dream? The interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for the single woman is a clearer site. According to the opinion of dream interpretation scholars, its interpretation is the car in a dream. The single woman felt comfortable in this car, because this dream is good news for her close relationship with a good and beloved man, with whom she will enjoy a stable life. If a single girl sees that she is going to service the car and drive it in her dream, then this dream describes her condition, her needs, and the goals she wants to achieve. Indeed, all of these goals and aspirations will be achieved in the near future. The symbol of a car in a single woman’s dream is evidence that she seizes opportunities and knows how to organize her time and manage it in a way that does not waste it. But the evil of seeing and driving a car in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there are those around her who He tries to put obstacles in her way, making her delay in completing her tasks and moving forward for the better. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream riding in a car with a man she does not know, then this dream indicates her imminent marriage and that God will keep her away from the evil that would have harmed her because of excessive confidence. With it. Everyone around her. Riding a car with someone she knows and has an emotional relationship with in a dream, and this means that he will get married soon and live a stable life after he used to live a life characterized by instability. If an unmarried girl sees that she is riding in a car with a famous person, this means that she will soon get a A prominent position among members of her community. But if she and her friend were driving a car in a dream, this dream shows the strength of the relationship and friendship between them and the extent of love and friendship that prevails between them. Sitting in the front seat of a car in a single woman’s dream shows her character and character, which is her love of control and being a leader in a way It makes her know how to manage her affairs intelligently. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman. After learning about the dream interpretation of the car in a single woman’s dream, it is necessary to know its interpretation also in a married woman’s dream, which is as follows: If a married woman sees that she is driving a car and enjoys driving, then this dream suggests that she She will overcome the differences, disputes, and obstacles in her married life by sharing her help with her husband. But if the married woman is riding a car and this makes her sad or uncomfortable, then this dream indicates that she was unable to overcome her obstacles because of her extreme fear that makes her hands tied. Driving a car for a woman For a married woman in a dream, the goal of this vision is excessive fear for her and her future and a constant feeling of backwardness in her rights. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing driving a car in a dream for a pregnant woman carrying others, and kindness also appeared in the interpretation of the dream. The car in a dream for a single woman, as this vision A pregnant woman foretells that she will enjoy a pregnancy without any fatigue. If...

The interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for the single woman is a clearer site. According to the opinion of dream interpretation scholars, its interpretation is the car in a dream. The single woman felt comfortable in this car, because this dream is good news for her close relationship with a good and beloved man, with whom she will enjoy a stable life. If a single girl sees that she is going to service the car and drive it in her dream, then this dream describes her condition, her needs, and the goals she wants to achieve. Indeed, all of these goals and aspirations will be achieved in the near future. The symbol of a car in a single woman’s dream is evidence that she seizes opportunities and knows how to organize her time and manage it in a way that does not waste it. But the evil of seeing and driving a car in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there are those around her who He tries to put obstacles in her way, making her delay in completing her tasks and moving forward for the better. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream riding in a car with a man she does not know, then this dream indicates her imminent marriage and that God will keep her away from the evil that would have harmed her because of excessive confidence. With it. Everyone around her. Riding a car with someone she knows and has an emotional relationship with in a dream, and this means that he will get married soon and live a stable life after he used to live a life characterized by instability. If an unmarried girl sees that she is riding in a car with a famous person, this means that she will soon get a A prominent position among members of her community. But if she and her friend were driving a car in a dream, this dream shows the strength of the relationship and friendship between them and the extent of love and friendship that prevails between them. Sitting in the front seat of a car in a single woman’s dream shows her character and character, which is her love of control and being a leader in a way It makes her know how to manage her affairs intelligently. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman. After learning about the dream interpretation of the car in a single woman’s dream, it is necessary to know its interpretation also in a married woman’s dream, which is as follows: If a married woman sees that she is driving a car and enjoys driving, then this dream suggests that she She will overcome the differences, disputes, and obstacles in her married life by sharing her help with her husband. But if the married woman is riding a car and this makes her sad or uncomfortable, then this dream indicates that she was unable to overcome her obstacles because of her extreme fear that makes her hands tied. Driving a car for a woman For a married woman in a dream, the goal of this vision is excessive fear for her and her future and a constant feeling of backwardness in her rights. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing driving a car in a dream for a pregnant woman carrying others, and kindness also appeared in the interpretation of the dream.
